concept.title: Quiz: Short Descriptions
concept.shortdesc: Test your understanding of the structure, purpose, and best practices of DITA short descriptions.

ol.li:
What is the main goal of a short description in DITA?
a) To replace the title
b) To summarize the topic for readers and improve navigation
c) To display steps
d) To show metadata

What is the optimal length range for effective short descriptions?
a) 10-15 words
b) 25-50 words
c) 75-100 words
d) 100-150 words

Where should the <shortdesc> element appear in a topic file?
a) Before the title
b) Inside the steps
c) Directly after the title, before the body
d) At the end of the topic

Which short description pattern is most appropriate for task topics?
a) Brief definition + why it matters
b) Goal statement + when to perform
c) Content scope + intended use
d) Problem description + resolution method

What makes a short description ineffective?
a) It is two sentences long
b) It restates the title without adding value
c) It provides context
d) It uses clear, concise language
